topic.title: Export XLIFF folder with search Translation Memory Databases

body.p: A folder can be exported into the XLIFF-format using "Export As: XLIFF folder" in the tab "General". A new functionality Export including the "Search translation memories" has been added to the XLIFF-folder export. If the search translation memories should be exported too, the option With search Translation Memory databases in the tab Options needs to be selected. As a result, the exported XLIFF-folder not only contains memory proposals from the project translation memory, but it also contains memory proposals from the search translation memories. The API call EqfExportFolder supports the XLIFF-folder export including memory proposals from the search translation memories too.
